item.title: ‘Beer Belly’ Can Cause Cardiac Damage
item.description: Visceral obesity is associated with increased left ventricular mass and reduced ventricular volumes — suggesting concentric remodeling. Medscape Medic...

item.title: Novel Tool Flags Gaps in Epilepsy Care
item.description: An autonomous AI tool that scans patient records is helping clinicians spot overlooked tests and referrals. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Lost Work, Higher Costs Likely With Lower Vax Rates
item.description: Social media ranks second as information source among younger adults, but healthcare providers still come out ahead. Medscape Medical News

item.title: The Brainstem and Pain: New Research, New Understanding
item.description: Multiple teams have used powerful imaging, targeted placebo experiments, and AI to map and understand the brainstem’s pain circuitry like never before...

item.title: Social Media ‘Detox’ May Boost Mental Health in Young Adults
item.description: Reducing social media use for a week is linked to improvements in depression, anxiety, and insomnia in young adults, a new study shows. Medscape Medic...
